hibernate-mapping.query: FROM com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.operations.ratebenchmark.RateBenchMarkMatrixDO matrix where matrix.rateBenchMarkMatrixHeaderDO.rateBenchMarkProductDO.rateBenchMarkHeaderDO.rateIndustryCategoryDO.rateIndustryCategoryId=:rateIndustryCategoryId AND matrix.rateBenchMarkMatrixHeaderDO.rateBenchMarkProductDO.rateBenchMarkHeaderDO.rateBenchMarkHeaderId =:rateBenchMarkHeaderId AND matrix.rateBenchMarkMatrixHeaderDO.rateBenchMarkProductDO.rateBenchMarkHeaderDO.rateCustomerCategoryDO.rateCustomerCategoryId =:rateCustomerCategoryId AND matrix.rateBenchMarkMatrixHeaderDO.rateBenchMarkProductDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryId =:rateProductCategoryId AND matrix.rateBenchMarkMatrixHeaderDO.vobSlab =:vobSlab AND matrix.rateOriginSector =:rateOriginSector

FROM com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.operations.ratebenchmark.RateBenchMarkMatrixDO matrix where matrix.rateBenchMarkMatrixHeaderDO.rateBenchMarkProductDO.rateBenchMarkHeaderDO.rateIndustryCategoryDO.rateIndustryCategoryId=:rateIndustryCategoryId AND matrix.rateBenchMarkMatrixHeaderDO.rateBenchMarkProductDO.rateBenchMarkHeaderDO.rateBenchMarkHeaderId =:rateBenchMarkHeaderId AND matrix.rateBenchMarkMatrixHeaderDO.rateBenchMarkProductDO.rateBenchMarkHeaderDO.rateCustomerCategoryDO.rateCustomerCategoryId =:rateCustomerCategoryId AND matrix.rateBenchMarkMatrixHeaderDO.rateBenchMarkProductDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryId =:rateProductCategoryId AND matrix.rateBenchMarkMatrixHeaderDO.vobSlab =:vobSlab AND matrix.rateOriginSector IS NULL
